summary.para: This structure is used to specify an endpoint policy extension.

remarks.para: This extension can be used to specify a custom assertion or an assertion that is supported by this library so that the application can retrieve the original XML form of the assertion. If one of the supported assertions is specified as an extension, the corresponding constraint should not be specified. For example, if http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/07/securitypolicy:TransportBinding is specified as an endpoint extension, cannot be specified as a constraint.
The following assertions are not allowed as policy extension because they might affect constraint matching result if the assertion is handled as assertion.

summary.para: The base policy extension that this policy extension derives from.
Name of the assertion to be retrieved as an extension.
Namespace of the assertion to be retrieved as an extension.

When returns NOERROR and if the specified assertion is found in the policy alternative, assertionValue returns the read-only content. Returned buffer should not be modified or freed. If not found, it is set to NULL.
